title: Evaluating Restaurant Competitiveness Through Online Review Text Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis, Python programming, machine learning fundamentals, and text mining concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based learning utilizing real restaurant review data, focusing on cultivating analytical tool skills in digital environments and business acumen

learning_goals: Learners can design rule-based and machine learning models to identify comparative sentences in online reviews
Learners can implement a system to extract sentiment scores and key attributes from comparative sentences for evaluating restaurant competitiveness
Learners can write analytical reports identifying relative strengths and weaknesses of restaurant services/menus using real-world data (e.g., Dianping.com)

resources: Google Colab or cloud computing resources

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
